title: Item Lore中配置问题
author: MC之小欧
txt_content:
配置中自然伤害说是按20血的百分比算的，这一项可以禁用吗 因为摔落伤害让我很头疼
environmentalDamage:
  block_explosion:
    damage: 10
    durabilityLost: 40
  cactus:
    damage: 2.5
    durabilityLost: 10
  drowning:
    damage: 5
    durabilityLost: 0
  entity_explosion:
    damage: 20
    durabilityLost: 40
